data.title: Galveston Area Region of Texas
data.meta_description: There are 13 counties in the Houston-Galveston Area region of Texas: Austin, Brazoria, Chambers, Colorado, Fort Bend, Galveston, Harris, Liberty, Matagorda, Montgomery, Walker, Waller and Wharton.
data.text:
There are 13 counties in the Houston-Galveston Area region of Texas.

Visiting the Houston-Galveston Area Region

Baytown, Conroe, Friendswood, Galveston, Houston, Huntsville, La Porte, League City, Missouri City, Pasadena, Pearland, Sugar Land, Texas City.

Map of Counties in the Houston-Galveston Area Region

Austin, Brazoria, Chambers, Colorado, Fort Bend, Galveston, Harris, Liberty, Matagorda, Montgomery, Walker, Waller, Wharton.

Houston-Galveston Area Counties and County Seats

08 - Austin County: Bellville.

20 - Brazoria County: Angleton.

36 - Chambers County: Anahuac.

45 - Colorado County; Columbus.

79 - Fort Bend County: Richmond.

Missouri City is on U.S. Highway 90A and State Highway 6, twenty miles south-west of downtown Houston in north-east Fort Bend and south-west Harris counties.

84 - Galveston County: Galveston.

101 - Harris County: Houston.

Friendswood was founded in 1895 by members of the Religious Society of Friends (Quakers). Today, Friendswood houses the Houston area headquarters for the Quaker Society.

The Religious Society of Friends:

Large listing of Quaker links, plus hosting for a number of Quaker groups.

146 - Liberty County: Liberty.

161 - Matagorda County: Bay City.

170 - Montgomery County: Conroe.

236 - Walker County: Huntsville.

237 - Waller County: Hempstead.

241 - Wharton County: Wharton.
